column6:
- Unique space w/ old-time character and cool modern conveniences. 

- High ceilings, stainless steel appliances, concrete countertops. 

- Smart TVs in bedrooms and living room. 

- 160 sq ft loft space. 

- 170 sq ft outdoor deck. 

- New washer/dryer

- Close to Med Center, Rice, Museum, NRG
